B. The video explains a step-by-step process involving initially cooking the vegetables and beef together for a balance of textures, followed by stir-frying noodles to allow them to soak in the flavors, and finishing by merging all ingredients into a cohesive dish.

C. The video showcases a method where noodles are prepared separately for texture, then stir-fried briefly with vegetables and beef, and finished with a long toss in sauce to create a flavorful and tender stir-fried noodle dish.

D. The video depicts a process in which beef and vegetables are cooked first, uncooked noodles are added directly into the pan, and everything is stir-fried and steamed together to balance flavors and achieve the right texture.
answer: The images depict a progression in the stir-frying technique. In the first image, the cook is shown stir-frying initial components, specifically vegetables and potentially meat, establishing the foundation of the dish by developing flavor through searing and caramelization. The second image provides a closer view of the continued process, indicating further integration and cooking of these ingredients, ensuring that they are evenly cooked. The final image culminates with the addition of noodles to the wok, being mixed with the pre-fried vegetables and meat, to form the completed dish. Here, the focus is on combining textures and flavors, as the noodles absorb the stir-fry elements, demonstrating the end of the stir-frying process and the completion of the dish.
